Html:
Hi,

first of all congratulations for the hard work. This library is really brilliant!

I have a question:

can i "copy" a style from a cell of worksheet 1 and then set as shared in cells of worksheet 2?

 

I tried something so but it didn't work.


        $sheet = $phpexcel->getSheetByName('styles');


        $styles = array();


        $styles['category'] = $sheet->getStyle("B10");
        $styles['url']['expected'] =  $sheet->getStyle("B11");
        $styles['url']['real'] = $sheet->getStyle("B13");


        $sheet = $phpexcel->getSheetByName('output');

        $sheet->setSharedStyle($styles['category'],  "B2:L2");

Where is the problem?
nobody has an answer about this? or just an hint
